page.title: 12A MORNING IN SCHOOL
page.content: At 9.10am Mr Hardey said "Recorders go and record!"Kelda started playing her recorder in the class and got a glare from 'You know who!'I gave Sarah Piggot my swimming money to look after and we went into the hall to collect the music stands. Katie got her finger stuck and yelled out loud when Pr Parker(Headmaster) was walking past.We felt really embarrassed. We took the music stands to the staffroom very carefully just in case Mr Parker came through again. We did some treble recorder first, then song of the Volga Boatman.Then we went into the hall to do it with the piano. It worked out much better. The second time Mr Hardey came into listen.Fiona W and Helen W messed it ip by giggling.Sarah lost my swimming money, but she eventually found it in her desk.
